name: Spot the Difference (itch) (Dawars)
description:
This game aims to raise awareness about the subtle changes in our environment over the decades.

If you are interested in our other projects follow us at: https://twitter.com/Window2DPast

The last puzzle in the game is the Hungarian National Theatre which was demolished in 1965. In our self funded project we are reconstructing it from surviving  photo collections using #photogrammetry and #DeepLearning.

Assets used:

  • USA Before: Library of Congress, Prints & Photographs Division, FSA/OWI Collection
  • NYC Grid: All rights reserved by Paul Sahner https://www.paulsahner.com/
  • Poland: CC-BY 4.0 https://www.re.photos/en/compilation/6053/
  • Malaysia: CC-BY-SA 4.0 https://www.re.photos/en/compilation/695/
  • Belgium: CC-BY-SA 4.0 https://www.re.photos/en/compilation/2827/
  • Japan: CC-BY 4.0 https://www.re.photos/en/compilation/5385/
  • Hungary: CC-BY-SA-3.0 Fortepan - MZSL/Ofner Károly https://fortepan.hu/hu/photos/?id=41842
  • Hungary before: Metropolitan Ervin Szabó Library, Budapest https://foto.fszek.hu/WebPac_kep/CorvinaWeb?action=onelong&recnum=762494&pos=
  • JSL Ancient Font by Jeff Lee
  • Pecita Font by Philippe Cochy under SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1
  • 851 Tegaki Zatsu Font https://pm85122.onamae.jp/85122font.html
